pages.text: Adds six levels to the amplification of spell effects and one effective level to spells cast, at the expense of 35% longer cooldowns and 10% reduced effect durations. This modifier is unique to the (l:amethyst_imbuement:focus/getting_started)Spellcasters Focus$(), to obtain it you must ignite your focus to a new tier and select it from one of three options presented.

pages.mod_text: The spells you cast crackle with an ancient power. Appears on a Spellcasters Focus on tier ignition.
